name: The Typing Machine
description:
"A super computer has become sentient and is trying to destroy the world. You need to distract it by typing as many coherent English words as possible as fast as possible for as long as you have to.

There's a meter that shows you how close the super computer is to taking over the world. This meter fills in real time. After you type a word, the game checks a dictionary to see if the word is real (like spellcheck). While it's checking the Death Meter stops. If it's a real word, it looses a small amount of its Death Meter. If it's not a word, it gains some of its Death Meter. All words have to be four letters or more. Hitting the space bar signifies that a work is complete.
You can't use the same word twice, and longer words are more "distracting" (detract more from the Death Meter)." - This Machine Kills Fascis

A game made from the ideas of Select Button forum member, This Machine Kills Fascis.

Requires Python 3. I'll upload a binary one day, sorry!
